title: Vadodara-based EV maker Wardwizard to form JV in Saudi Arabia to roll out electric vehicles
description: Wardwizard Innovations & Mobility, based in Vadodara, announced plans to form a joint venture in Saudi Arabia to establish two electric vehicle assembly plants. The company has received a Letter of Intent and completed a feasibility study confirming the project's viability. This move aligns with Saudi Arabia's vision for sustainable transportation.
